title: Polyphonic Spree or The Sound of Music Type by Herb Lubalin
content:
Hello I was wondering what typeface this is based off of even though it is customized. and/or id anyone know what The Sound Of Music type is based off of by Herb Lubalin in his book. I just want to find out the digital version of the typeface. Thanks in Advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824161303im_/http:/typophile.com/files/poly_5998.jpg)
author: supreme

comments.content: Here's the [Sound of Music type](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824161303/http:/img207.auctions.yahoo.co.jp/users/8/5/7/4/pre_serendipitybooks-img400x380-1144859799hl004-01.jpg), for comparison.
thanks for finding that reference! hopefully someone can ID this typeface for a base.

I'm not sure what the exact typeface is, but "Affair" from Veer is along the same lines.

[http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000181](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824161303/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000181 "http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000181")
cool thanks for the tip about affair... I do know of that... but I am looking more for a match of the sound of music one or more like this polyphonice spree one. Anyone? Please Help! Thanks.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824161303im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pre_serendipitybooks-img400x380-1144859799hl004-01_4524.jpg)

here is that pic of the sound of music. thanks skyfein.

\> _Hello I was wondering what typeface this is based off of even though it is customized._

Not all lettering is based off of existing typefaces, Quite on the contrary. This is definitely not based on anything.

[Jason Walcott](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824161303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Jason%20Walcott) sure knows how to handle curly stuff, so maybe check his [Jukebox Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824161303/http:/www.veer.com/products/vendor.aspx?vendor=jbt) faces.
Tony Di Spigna who was a partner at Herb Lubalin does a lot of lettering in this style. I wonder if he worked on the original "Sound of Music" logo.
